description: Complete catalog of statusline configurations for Claude Code
instructions: Use 'claude-config statusline <name>' to apply any of these configurations

minimal.description: Minimal statusline with just model and directory

grey-haven-default.description: Comprehensive statusline with git, cost, and productivity metrics

tamagotchi.description: Fun virtual pet that evolves with your coding activity

context-aware.description: Adapts based on language, git workflow, and activity

git-aware.description: Shows model, directory, and git branch
git-aware.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [ -n "$BRANCH" ]; then BRANCH=" | ğŸŒ¿ $BRANCH"; fi; echo "[$MODEL] ğŸ“ $DIR$BRANCH"'

cost-tracker.description: Shows model, cost, and session duration
cost-tracker.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); COST=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0" | xargs printf "%.4f"); DURATION=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_duration_ms // 0"); MINUTES=$((DURATION / 60000)); SECONDS=$(((DURATION % 60000) / 1000)); echo "[$MODEL] ğŸ’° \$$COST | â±ï¸ ${MINUTES}m ${SECONDS}s"'

development.description: Shows model, git status, lines changed, and directory
development.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); ADDED=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_lines_added // 0"); REMOVED=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_lines_removed // 0"); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); echo "[$MODEL] ğŸŒ¿ $BRANCH | ğŸ“ $DIR | +$ADDED/-$REMOVED"'

colorful.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); COST=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0" | xargs printf "%.4f"); echo -e "\033[1;36m[$MODEL]\033[0m \033[1;33mğŸ“ $DIR\033[0m \033[1;32mğŸ’° \$$COST\033[0m"'

performance.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); API_MS=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_api_duration_ms // 0"); TOTAL_MS=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_duration_ms // 0"); if [ "$TOTAL_MS" -gt 0 ]; then PERF=$((API_MS * 100 / TOTAL_MS)); else PERF=0; fi; echo "[$MODEL] âš¡ API: ${API_MS}ms (${PERF}% of total)"'

time-based.description: Shows different emoji based on time of day
time-based.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); HOUR=$(date +%H); if [ $HOUR -ge 6 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 12 ]; then EMOJI="â˜•"; elif [ $HOUR -ge 12 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 17 ]; then EMOJI="â˜€ï¸"; elif [ $HOUR -ge 17 ] && [ $HOUR -lt 21 ]; then EMOJI="ğŸŒ…"; else EMOJI="ğŸŒ™"; fi; echo "$EMOJI [$MODEL] $(date +%H:%M)"'

environment.description: Shows different colors/emojis based on directory context
environment.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); CWD=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); DIR=$(basename "$CWD"); if [[ "$CWD" == */production/* ]]; then ENV="ğŸ”´ PROD"; elif [[ "$CWD" == */staging/* ]]; then ENV="ğŸŸ¡ STAGE"; elif [[ "$CWD" == */test/* ]]; then ENV="ğŸŸ¢ TEST"; else ENV="ğŸ”µ DEV"; fi; echo "[$MODEL] $ENV | ğŸ“ $DIR"'

git-dirty.description: Shows git status with dirty/clean indicators
git-dirty.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); if git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null; then GIT="âœ…"; else GIT="ğŸ”´"; fi; BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); echo "[$MODEL] $GIT $BRANCH | ğŸ“ $DIR"'

compact.description: Compact view with all key information
compact.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); M=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name" | cut -c1-3); D=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); C=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0" | xargs printf "%.2f"); B=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null | cut -c1-10 || echo "none"); A=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_lines_added // 0"); echo "$M|$B|$D|+$A|\$$C"'

emoji-status.description: Uses emojis to convey status at a glance
emoji-status.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); COST=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0"); if (( $(echo "$COST > 1.0" | bc -l) )); then COST_EMOJI="ğŸ’¸"; elif (( $(echo "$COST > 0.5" | bc -l) )); then COST_EMOJI="ğŸ’µ"; else COST_EMOJI="ğŸ’°"; fi; if git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null; then GIT_EMOJI="âœ¨"; else GIT_EMOJI="ğŸš§"; fi; echo "[$MODEL] $GIT_EMOJI $COST_EMOJI"'

progress-bar.description: Shows context usage as a progress bar
progress-bar.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); COST=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0" | xargs printf "%.2f"); PCT=$(($(echo "$COST * 20" | bc | cut -d. -f1))); if [ $PCT -gt 100 ]; then PCT=100; fi; BAR=""; for i in $(seq 1 10); do if [ $((i * 10)) -le $PCT ]; then BAR="${BAR}â–ˆ"; else BAR="${BAR}â–‘"; fi; done; echo "[$MODEL] Context: [$BAR] \$$COST"'

model-colors.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); case "$MODEL" in Opus) COLOR="\033[95m" EMOJI="ğŸ§ ";; Sonnet) COLOR="\033[94m" EMOJI="ğŸµ";; Haiku) COLOR="\033[92m" EMOJI="ğŸƒ";; *) COLOR="\033[90m" EMOJI="ğŸ¤–";; esac; echo -e "${COLOR}${EMOJI} $MODEL\033[0m | ğŸ“ $DIR"'

productivity-metrics.description: Shows lines of code changed and productivity metrics
productivity-metrics.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); ADDED=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_lines_added // 0"); REMOVED=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_lines_removed // 0"); NET=$((ADDED - REMOVED)); COST=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".cost.total_cost_usd // 0.0001" | xargs printf "%.4f"); if [ "$ADDED" -gt 0 ]; then CPL=$(echo "scale=4; $COST / $ADDED" | bc); else CPL="0"; fi; echo "[$MODEL] ğŸ“Š +$ADDED/-$REMOVED (net: $NET) | \$${CPL}/line"'

bun-development.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); echo "ğŸ [$MODEL] Bun Development"'

grey-haven-branded.description: Custom Grey Haven Studio branded statusline
grey-haven-branded.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(basename $(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir")); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "main"); echo "ğŸ° Grey Haven | [$MODEL] | ğŸŒ¿ $BRANCH | ğŸ“ $DIR"'
